triggerResultMarginRunId.description: Run ID of the margin calculation instance

triggerResultTimeStamp.description: Time and Date when the calculation occurred, in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format

triggerResultCalculationType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCalculationTypeCode

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

currency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
currency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralPositionFinancialInstrumentIde.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

collateralPositionTickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

collateralPositionCollateralValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

collateralPositionCollateralValueCurrenc.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
collateralPositionCollateralValueCurrenc.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

marginPositionFinancialInstrumentIdentif.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

marginPositionTickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

marginPositionExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the instrument for the margin position, in YYYY-MM-DD format

marginPositionNetPosition.description: Value of the Net Position for the margin position (Long Position - Short Position)

marginPositionNetValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

marginPositionNetValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
marginPositionNetValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

marginPositionBroughtForwardNetValueAmou.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

marginPositionBroughtForwardNetValueCurr.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
marginPositionBroughtForwardNetValueCurr.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

marginPositionImSubPortfolio.description: IM sub portfolio of the instrument for the margin position

marginPositionLongPosition.description: Amount of Long Position for the margin position

marginPositionShortPosition.description: Amount of Short Position for the margin position

marginPositionLongValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

marginPositionLongValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
marginPositionLongValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

marginPositionShortValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

marginPositionShortValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
marginPositionShortValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode
